text: The Batu Anam railway station is a Malaysian railway halt located at Batu Anam, Segamat District, Johor. The station is between Gemas and Segamat stations. KTM Intercity train services were provided at this halt, however the station is currently not in active service. ==See also== * Rail transport in Malaysia Category:Railway stations in Malaysia Category:Segamat District
title: Batu Anam railway station
